experience.title: experience
experience.description:
> Full Stack Developer
  FXDX
  05/23 - Present

• Spearheaded the development of a liquidity-enhancing feature, resulting in a significant increase of up to 25M+ in liquidity for the exchange, thereby fostering improved trading opportunities for users.
• Constructed and integrated a robust REST API and GraphQL system, facilitating seamless connectivity of our exchange with external platforms, enhancing accessibility, and expanding the user base
• Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including product and marketing, to gain valuable insights into user requirements and market trends, contributing to the continuous improvement and development of the product to meet customer needs.



> SWE Intern
  Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
  02/23 - 06/23

• Actively engaged in self-directed learning of Python and experienced in utilizing cutting-edge libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and other new-generation technologies to streamline data analysis and enhance productivity.



> Blockchain Developer Intern
  Tech Alchemy
  08/22 - 11/22

• Developed smart contracts for projects involving Pre-sale tokens, Real Asset back NFTs. Worked on Smart contract auditing with security tools like Slither, Mythrix, etc
• Found 15+ High and Medium Vulnerabilities and Increased the Security Audit process by additional Unit Tests and Fuzz Testing.
• Worked on Smart contract auditing with security tools like slither, Mythrix etc.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me

Highly motivated and independent full-stack developer with a strong passion for technologies.I am constantly learning and evolving at every step of life.

Committed to delivering business value and constantly seeking opportunities to expand skill set while contributing effectively. A fast learner with adaptability, dedicated to building innovative solutions.
